name: Yesterday Once More 昨日重现
name_original: Yesterday Once More 昨日重现
description:
Works made in the Global Game Jam NEXT 2021 held within NExT Studios.

参加NExT Studios内部举办的 Global Game Jam NEXT 2021的作品。

A harmless little game of GameJam developed by me and 11, with original artwork designed by an 8-year-old.

由8岁的小朋友进行原画设计，我和11开发的GameJam的一个人畜无害的小游戏。

A small world of aliens, dinosaurs, and buses was constructed based on the children's imagination and graffiti drawings. Players click and drag objects in the scene to specific locations to recreate scenes from the past and gradually explore a recurring story.

根据小朋友的想象与涂鸦画构建了一个外星人、恐龙、大巴车的小世界。玩家通过点击拖动场景中物件到特定位置，来对过去的场景进行重现，逐渐探索一个循环往复的故事。

【Theme：Representation 主题：再现】

Recommended for tablet or computer browsers, also visit the Xpaidia Studios server

建议在平板或电脑浏览器上进行访问，也可访问落日间服务器 xpaidia.com/game/representation
